::Halucigen::
This could not stop Halucigen.  Even withour movement he could defeat 
anybody. His eyes darted to Ignatius, who should be stuck as well by 
his trap for he is made of metal and is in the room.  He began to try 
and flood the bots mind with a nightmare.

(You can post whether or not i can put the nightmare in his head or 
not.)
